definition: the act of approaching or entering, to reach or gain access to
details:
noun
- the act of approaching or entering
= example: the act of approaching or entering
- a way of entering or leaving
= example: a way of entering or leaving
= synonyms: approach
- (computer science) the operation of reading or writing stored information
= synonyms: memory access
- the right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership)
- the right to enter
= synonyms: entree
- a code (a series of characters or digits) that must be entered in some way (typed or dialed or spoken) to get the use of something (a telephone line or a computer or a local area network etc.)
= synonyms: access code
verb
- to reach or gain access to
= example: to reach or gain access to
= synonyms: get at
- to obtain or retrieve from a storage device
= example: to obtain or retrieve from a storage device
